description: Open Food Facts is a non-profit, open-source initiative that collects and shares data on food products globally. Founded in 2012, it empowers consumers and researchers by providing accessible information about nutrition and environmental impacts. The project relies on community contributions to enhance its database, which currently includes millions of products from over 160 countries. By promoting transparency and informed choices, Open Food Facts aims to foster healthier eating habits and address food-related injustices.
name: Open Food Facts
